body:
The File Upload question enables you with the flexibility to give any simple or complex problem to the candidates. The problem statement might ask the candidates to provide a sample business plan or ask them to send you a .zip file of their coding side project. As the answer, the candidates report a link to an uploaded file which you can download and review.

Refer to the following topics for more information:

  1. Creating a File Upload Question
  2. Manual Scoring for General Questions
title: File Upload Question
